Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action

Class MultiStageAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.action.MultiStageAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    public class MultiStageAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action
    An Action which applies a different action depending on its current state.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  MultiStageAction.ArmingOption
      Arms a MultiStageAction to change state in a particular way next time it is applied.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiStageAction

        public MultiStageAction​(Action start,
                        Action hold,
                        Action end,
                        long holdThreshold)
        Constructs a new multi-stage action.
        Parameters:
        start - action applied when this action is "activated"
        hold - action applied the first time this action is signalled after it has been "activated"
        end - action applied when this action is "deactivated"
        holdThreshold - minimum number of ns this action must remain in the "active" state before moving on to the "decayed" state

    • Method Detail

      • arm

        public MultiStageAction arm​(MultiStageAction.ArmingOption armingOption,
                            long dt)
        Arms this action to move to the next state in its state sequence, according to the given arming option. The next time Action.apply(Entity) is invoked on this action, its state will change according to the current arming option.
        Parameters:
        armingOption - option influencing the next state this action moves to after its next application
        dt - ns elapsed since the last invocation of this method
        Returns:
        this

      • apply

        public void apply​(Entity entity)
        Applies this action to an entity if it is currently armed. If this action is not armed, does nothing. Disarms after application.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface Action
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to alter

      • getStart

        public Action getStart()
        Returns:
        action applied on activation, or null

      • getHold

        public Action getHold()
        Returns:
        action applied on first post-activation signal, or null

      • getEnd

        public Action getEnd()
        Returns:
        action applied on deactivation, or null
